reviews.title: I'm in Love with this 😍But Reviewers are mistaken
reviews.review_text: I am a skincare junkie and Elf's skincare is so slept on. Don't even get me started on the Pure Skin line!! SO good. Anyway, I do want to educate people on this product, because I've noticed a lot of the Reviewers don't sewm to understand what's going on here. In Asian skincare, they make exfoliating products called "Peeling Gels." That is definitely where Elf got the inspiration for this product. I love peeling gels SO much. They provide gentle physical exfoliation, and many have fruit acids, PHAs, LHAs, etc to provide a light chemical exfoliation as well. What makes the Elf one stand out is the lotion like consistency when you first apply it, and I love the scent. My complexion is always super smooth and even toned after using this product. For the people who think they are seeing "so much dead skin coming off"...that is NOT your skin loves. 😂 That is the cellulose in the product that is intentionally formulated to ball up on itself. That is how the product works lol. The little bits of balled up cellulose are what provide the mechanical exfoliation. Now, obviously some dead skin will be removed..as that's the entire point of an exfoliating product, but 98% of what you are seeing is the product itself. The act of rubbing it in is what causes the product to ball up and exfoliate. I just felt the need to clear that up because it seems that there are a lot of customers who do not understand how this product works and, if you ever have THAT much dead skin balling up and falling off of your face, that would actually be a little concerning lol. Anyway, this product is spectacular and totally worth the price:) ✨️

I'm so happy with this product. Love it. It makes my skin feels so smooth and soft

It's easy to use and satisfying too. It leaves my skin very soft.

reviews.review_text: I really like this exfoliate. I have sensitive skin and I didn't have any issues with skin.

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.review_text: Love it, the price is perfect and it works great!! from 1 to 10 a 10

reviews.review_text: Gives my skin what it needs without drying it out. Affordable and good quality.

reviews.title: it works.
reviews.review_text: nice thermal insulated curtain. great for the price.

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review_text: It's the best exfoliants that I've had in a long time.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I've tried more expensive ones too. This is a go to for me.
The product is wat watery and doesn't have an exfoliate in it as advertized.
Love this product. Easy, gentle exfoliation. Will buy again.

reviews.title: Great Dupe and Great Value
reviews.review_text: Works wonderfully! Peter Thomas Roth dupe at 1/3 the price. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Great Product - BAD PUMP SYSTEM
reviews.review_text: I've been using this since e.l.f. introduced it and I love it. I use it 3 times a week and it leaves my skin soft and glowing. BUT I agree with many other reviewers. The pump system NEVER works properly after about the second or third use and I too have to open it up and smear it on my hand to use. The biggest frustration is a lot of product ends up being wasted because you can't get it all out. E.L.F - PLEASE RETHINK THE PUMP!!

reviews.title: Nice but the packaging is super lame
reviews.review_text: Love the formula but HATE the awful packaging. Like other's reviews, the pump NEVER WORKED and the plastic bottle it comes in WON'T SQUEEZE so you are basically screwed when you actually want to use this product. E.L.F - PLEASE just put this formula in a squeee tube like hundreds of your other products you carry so we can use this product as intended.

reviews.title: Shame about the pump
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed how my skin felt after using this product. However, I used it once before the pump just stopped working. This means I have to dig into the bottle to get the product which isn't ideal for skin care. Wouldn't repurchase until this issue is resolved.

reviews.title: Love this product
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. Can't tell you how many times I've bought this through the years. My only complaint is the pump- you'd think they'd upgrade it with how many people complain about it. It never works, I usually have to unscrew it and grab product by the stems of the pump- very unsanitary but what else can you do when the pump never works

reviews.title: HOLY CRAP
reviews.review_text: First off, let me just say, the person who left a review saying it was misleading or didn't work is either lying or has a face made of stone. I have NEVER IN MY LIFE used a products that visibly pulled dead skin off my face. I mean visble clumps of dead skin. Insane!! And there's not a single grain of abrasive beads or sugar in it. It goes on soft like a face cream and as you message it lifts the dead skin and balls it up into little clumps. I used plenty of exfoliating face washes and I've never had this kind of result. BEWARE--- it says gentle, but I was stupid enough to use it 3 times a row to make sure all the dead skin was off....I ended up taking a layer off my nose 😂 the directions on the bottle clearly say to use it 2 or 3 times a WEEK...so I shouldn't have used it 3 times in a row back to back. That was stupid of me. But hey.... more proof it works VERY well. Lol.

reviews.title: Wonderful for Stubborn Skin!
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best purchases I've ever made. I have oily and sensitive skin, which means that get a lot of product built up on my skin, even after using a cleanser. Exfoliators with grit in them don't do anything with my skin but make it irritated, usually. But this product gently took *everything* off without irritation, and has left me with shockingly soft skin. I can actually FEEL AIR ON MY FACE! It's fantastic! The funniest part? My husband loves it for himself! Amazing product, will absolutely buy again.

reviews.title: Great for sensitive/reddish skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about 2 weeks now. (2x/week). The exfoliants always recommended to me were the scratchy ones that left my skin flaky and the red areas redder. This Gentle Exfoliant is perfect. It pushes away dead skin leaving it smooth and soft. Not tight and red.

reviews.title: Key word is gentle for this exfoliant
reviews.review_text: For those expecting instant results, the key word is gentle for this exfoliant and you need patience and commitment to achieve the complexion of your dreams. I am in my late 40s and have a light complexion with some sun and age spots and fine lines by the mouth and eyes. I tried out this Gentle Peeling Exfoliant and was impressed by the licorice root, papaya and tangerine extracts. Licorice root helps with dark spots on the skin, papaya helps remove dead skin and tangerine has vitamin C. These are all natural ingredients that together pack a punch for a better complexion without any dryness or excess inflammation. I found that I could tolerate this exfoliant without further irritating my skin and that's the kind of product I was looking for. I used this product once a week for 6 months and I liked how my skin looked calmer and smoother.

reviews.title: Product is awesome, pump is not
reviews.review_text: This product is the most amazing exfoliant that I've ever come across! My skin is so soft after using and makes it noticeable smoother. I also use it on my hands as well. The only problem is the pump is subpar. It gets clogged easily and then I have to open the bottle itself to get to the product.

reviews.title: Skin Feels Good But Packaging is Not
reviews.review_text: My skin felt really nice after using it but the pump stopped working after once use which now means I have dig out the product every time which is a bit of a hassle for skin care. Also, the product doesn't feel like exfoliant, when you rub the smooth cream on your face it feels like it gathers into lint balls on your face. I love my elf products but I won't be buying this again.

reviews.title: Good physical exfoliator, gentle
reviews.review_text: This is a physical, not chemical, exfoliant which works by trapping dead skin in cellulose fibers. It is easy to use and non-abrasive, you just rub it into the skin in small circles for a few minutes, then wash off. It is impossible to overdo it with this product, which is why I like it so much. I use it once per week before a mud mask and my skin glows after and is super soft.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.review_text: First time trying this. The way that it took all the dead skin off my face AND my face wasn't raw afterward!!!

reviews.title: Really good!
reviews.review_text: This exfoliant is super effective, but gentle enough for my dry skin. It works as well as more high end products. A new must for me!

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.review_text: Found this product after trying other scrubs and I was impressed by how easy it was to use and what a good job it did. It's on my wish list
Got as a sample. Smells a little like white glue to me. Just didn't work for sensitive skin (dry patches and redness after trying) might work for someone with less sensitive skin though.

reviews.title: My new go-to exfoliator!
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for an exfoliator that does something besides rubbing rough creams on the face. This one is so smooth, and the dead skin cells practically fall off. I use it before my face wash so I can get my face free of debris afterward.

reviews.title: good product
reviews.review_text: i bought this a month ago and it works yesssssssss

reviews.title: Super gentle!
reviews.review_text: Made my dry skin nice and smooth. Amazed by this collection so far.

reviews.title: Omg works so well
reviews.review_text: Absolutely gets all the dead skin off my face! It is kind of gross but it works so…

reviews.title: Great Product...terrible packaging.
reviews.review_text: Right from the get go, the pump did not work. I've seen a lot of reviews that have said the same thing but looks like Elf is doing nothing about it. I do like the product after having to dig in the bottle to get it.

reviews.title: Shocking results
reviews.review_text: This came in the mail yesterday and I used it during my night routine. I was shocked by the amount of dead skin that came off my face!!! My face feels so clean and smooth. The pump on the bottle is my only complaint.

reviews.title: My skin is so soft
reviews.review_text: I have tried several exfoliants like this and not only is this one the most affordable but it makes my skin baby soft without any discomfort or irritation. I'm a big fan.

reviews.title: Must have
reviews.review_text: I am 50, and I cannot live without this stuff. I have very very sensitive skin ( and rocesa), and this doesn't bother it. I use it 2x week. I am always amazed at all the dead skin it takes off. My skin feels so clean and clear afterwards. Highly recommend. Great value $ also.

reviews.title: so glad I gave this a try!
reviews.review_text: Peeling Exfoliants are kind of scary to me - so I liked that this one was "gentle" and could be used several times a week without danger. I do like that I see an instant brightening of the skin and experience no irritation after use! it's like hitting a "refresh" button!

reviews.title: Product: A+. Bottle: F-
reviews.review_text: Love the product. Really feels great and leaves skin feeling so fresh. It feels satisfying with the little bits cleaning your skin. But the darn pump hasn't worked since I bought it at all. Please just do a squeeze tube! I had to transfer the product in order to continue to use it. And it's clear based off reviews here and other sites where this product is available this is a very common issue.

reviews.title: The best Exfoliator I've ever used
reviews.review_text: Ok so let me just clarify that I only gave this product 4 stars because it contains fragrance and it came with a non-working dispenser. But other than that this product is the holy grail of exfoliators for me. I've been using Paula's Choice BHA & AHA products which many people consider holy grails, but the first use of the elf exfoliator removed more dead skin than Paula's Choice ever removed in the many months I've been using them. A few uses later and my skin is glowing. I thought I would have to go the rest of my life with my face looking dull and old with the layers of dead skin that was on there. I became really frustrated and just bought this product on a whim to make up the amount for afterpay lol. I didn't think it would really work, but after the first use I was sold. Please ELF, make this fragrance-free and I will be your unofficial ambassador for this product lol.

reviews.title: Great product!
reviews.review_text: I looked for this all over just because it had great reviews. I had an issue with so much dry skin that when I would put my foundation on you could see all the little flakes. The first time I applied it to my skin I could instantly feel the dry skin falling off/coming off. After using the warm water to rinse my skin 1000 times softer. I read one of the comments below about this just being cellulose but I don't believe that. I tested the theory by trying it a second time shortly after and nothing balled up. I feel as if it was just something in the product. It would've done the same thing, but I think I just didn't have any more dead skin to remove and therefore the product just stayed is normal consistency.

reviews.title: Best Exfoliant Ever Used!
reviews.review_text: I hadn't used a mask or exfoliant in quite some time so I decided to try this one. It is the best I have ever used and I have tried a lot in my lifetime. It is quick, easy to use and my skin looks and feels great afterwards. I have purchased more as I want to make sure I don't ever run out.

reviews.title: Ok but not great
reviews.review_text: This seems just like a normal exfoliating peel. I didn't notice my face being any softer or glowing after I used it. I also hate how they put ingredients in it that ball up to make people think it's doing more than what it actually is. I'll use it but probably wouldn't purchase again.

reviews.title: Product good
reviews.review_text: I bought this product maybe 2 months ago, it works well, but the pump itself is horrible, only used the product 3 times because just getting the product out is a hassle, and the bottle cap sticks so its hard to open, so I don't think I would buy this again

reviews.title: magic. just need a better pump
reviews.review_text: this stuff is amazing. one use and my pores were much less visible, and my skin felt so smooth. The pump basically didn't work though - I don't know if I got a bad bottle, or it's a common thing (reading other reviews, sounds like it might be common) - but that doesn't affect the efficacy of the product.

reviews.title: Love the product hate the bottle
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for awhile now and the cleanser itself is amazing. I have PCOS and the problem skin that comes with it and this seems to really help. The bottle it comes in is rubbish though. Pump has failed on every one I've had so far :(

reviews.title: My skin is so smooth!
reviews.review_text: I picked this up because I read that chemical exfoliants were less irritating for healing acne spots. I used it for the first time tonight, and the dead skin literally melted off my face! Gross, but satisfying. My skin is super smooth now, and I can't wait to keep using it!

reviews.title: Average exfoliant
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for a while now and haven't noticed a difference in my skin. It is very nice to use, and leaves skin feeling soft, however. It is also satisfying because the product balls up and makes it appear as if dead skin is being removed when in fact, it is not. Please don't be fooled by that.

reviews.title: Simply amazing
reviews.review_text: This exfoliator is made of magic. It removes all of the dirt from the pores simply, easily, and with biodegradable ingredients. The information in the top negative review is completely wrong. The cellulose isn't added to "trick" you into thinking that that's dead skin sloughing off. It's added as biodegradable replacement for the plastic microbeads the cosmetic industry used to use as scrubbing agents, because now we know those beads are filling up our oceans. The cellulose works by balling up, and catching the dirt. And it works like MAGIC. I've never seen my pores this clean in my life! Also left my skin feeling very soft, not dried out. I hope elf keeps this in stock forever! I ordered some for my sister, too!

reviews.title: SHOCKINGLY AMAZING
reviews.review_text: I don't think I've reviewed this product on here yet so I am now. My INSANELY sensitive, acne prone & INSANELY red complexion LOVES LOVES LOVES THIS STUFF!!! I recently turned 38 (on 11-23-21) & my skin has been CRAZY problematic since the start of teenage acne. Other than the not-so-pleasant smell...HOLY GRAIL!!!! I recently started incorporating a retinol product in my routine (facial cleanser/makeup remover) that also has quite a high percentage of vitamin C & after applying my moisturizer, there's still NO BURNING OR IRRITATION WHATSOEVER!!! I don't use it as often as it recommends, simply because I just flat out forget, but it's DEFINITELY in my list of "where have you been all my life" products. I wish I'd known about it while I was on my acne treatment routine. "I AM ABSOLUTELY OBSESSED" does NOT cut it!!!!

reviews.title: Worked on my peeling sunburn
reviews.review_text: It usually takes me DAYS to exfoliate from a peeling sunburn. (I live in Florida, it's easy to accidentally burn) this stuff removed like 90% of it this morning. Someone's review said it's just the product balling up but I completely disagree. There was significantly more balling up on my peeling areas than any other area or any other time I've used it.

reviews.title: Gets everythingggg off
reviews.review_text: I have pretty bad dry, flakey skin on the sides and bridge of my nose and on my forehead between my eyebrows. It is always there no matter how much I exfoliated or misguided and it was hella annoying. After the first time I used this it was immediatelyyy gone!!! Legit it was insane and I have sensitive skin too and it didn't irritate it! Also, when I saw the dry skin peels that was coming up at first I thought maybe it was a trick and the cleanser was balling up on itself. So I cleaned my hand with it once and it obv peeled, but the second time I did it there was no peeling. So the peels you get are actually dead skin coming off

reviews.title: Phenomenal
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. I've purchased it twice. It makes my skin feel so soft. It's not abrasive, and it doesn't irritate my sensitive skin like most exfoliants do. I have a fragrance allergy, and so far (I've been using it for 2 years), it hasn't caused any breakout or allergic reaction.

reviews.title: Doesn't actually peel
reviews.review_text: I've been searching for a legitimate peeling mask to exfoliate and rip off my nasty dead and dry skin. Every one I have seen so far has only been a rinse off mask, like this one. I did not read the directions when I purchased this because it says a peeling exfoliant right in the name, so I bought it. I was so disappointed when I went to use it and found out it was a rinse off mask. I've used it about four times since I bought it about 2 weeks ago, and I think I see or at least feel a difference in my skin which is nice. I just wanted to have that satisfying rip off of the face experience.

reviews.title: Um….customer for life!
reviews.review_text: Y'alllllll 🤩 I tried this for the first time today. I struggle with dry skin and an overall dullness that comes from it. I have sunspots/post inflammation discoloration as well and it just makes my face look muddy. This literally removed every bit of dry skin from my face. I am left with a bright smooth face. It's literally a completely different tone all together. I will never live without this product again. I rarely leave reviews but I felt the need to scream this from the rooftops!!

reviews.title: It DOES Work!
reviews.review_text: Despite reviews that say it's just the cellulose balling up- it's not just that! Cellulose does ball and that's how this work- by picking up the dead skin with it. The way you can tell it work is to do it twice. On the second go, after you've already smoothed off most of the surface dead skin, it will ball up much less. For how effective this is, it's so affordable. I used to use an obscure Korean brand for this type of exfoliation so I'm so pleased to have found this dupe!

reviews.title: Effective!
reviews.review_text: So yes, we all know that the white balled up pieces that form when using this are the ingredients and not all dead skin, but my esthetician told me that this product helps grab the dead skin cells and pull them away and collects them to allow the dead cells to stick to each other and then stick to the balls of the ingredients. Makes my skin SO soft and really helps keep any dry skin and loose cells under control. Works best when used in tandem with AHA and retinol skincare.

reviews.title: Horrible dispenser, excellent product
reviews.review_text: My skin feels much smoother every time I use this product. However I have yet to get a pumper that actually works. The straw in side is too narrow and it clogs up before it ever reaches the pumping mechanism. I end up getting the product out with an orange wood stick. I really wish ELF would fix this because it's super frustrating. Plus I'm wasting orange wood sticks. It's a good product though, but this is so frustrating I'm knocking off 2 stars.

reviews.title: Pump doesn't work
reviews.review_text: I worked this thing for 10 minutes. Shook it. Opened it up and moved it around. Nothing. I had to pour into my hand but I don't think I got enough out and by that time I was ticked off and over it. This is kinda thick and maybe the pump isn't wide enough for it to get through. I don't know but I'm not happy for sure. Getting it to go back in the bottle isn't easy. Whole experience sucked monkey you know what.

reviews.title: It works!
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical of the pilling that occurred, was not convinced it was all dead skin being exfoliated. But then I had whiteheads on my chin sprouting like crazy and I used this. Alleluia! After just one use, the whiteheads were gone I couldn't believe it. So it does work! What a find! Thank you elf cosmetics!

reviews.title: Gentle and effective
reviews.review_text: This reminds me of Tula's cult classic - much more affordable though!

reviews.title: Best thing I've ever used!!
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing at scrubbing away the grime and for the price, let's just say I'll be back to get plenty more!!

reviews.title: Love this!
reviews.review_text: I use this 3x a week and my skin tone is more even and super soft! I don't even need a moisturizer now! Love, Love this!

reviews.title: AMAZING
reviews.review_text: This exfoliator is AMAZING. I genuinely will be replacing all of my exfoliators with this product, including the ELF scrub. This product is gentle and effective.

reviews.title: Leaves your skin soft
reviews.review_text: I'm surprised at how well this works. With this changing cold weather, my skin has been flaking and this product was the only thing that helped. It not only exfoliated my skin but also left it moisturized.

reviews.title: Leaves skin clear
reviews.review_text: I bought this product and its the best exfoliating scrub it leaves my skin refreshed and smooth and helps remove any dead or dry skin. My favourite item at the moment.

reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.review_text: I bought this about a month ago, works great my skin had a problem adapting to me wearing makeup and this worked great. Once you use it the skin sticking to your face is a little annoying.

reviews.title: Need new packaging!
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I use it everyday. However the pump breaks after a few uses and the bottle is so stiff that you can't squeeze the product out. Please consider new packaging maybe a tube.

reviews.title: Packaging
reviews.review_text: I am so happy the packaging went from solid pump to more of a squeeze pump. The prior bottle pump would always clog, or wouldn't collect product. I used to have to take off the top and dump product in my hand. LOVE the new design.

reviews.title: Finally an exfoliator for sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first exfoliant I have used on my sensitive skin that hasn't caused redness or breakouts. I'm so pleased this has worked for my skin it left it feeling squeaky clean and glowing. Definitely worth the purchase.

reviews.title: Works to remove dead skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical that this would be gentle but it is. I like the smell and the exfoliation that is gentle enough to use multiple times a week. It's a go to regular product for me.

reviews.title: Creates flawless skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. Its easy to use and I noticed the difference in my skin after just one use! I have sensitive skin so this product was great.

reviews.title: WOW
reviews.review_text: I had a BAD case of congested skin and this has worked magic! I canr say enough hood things about it! I will continue to use this along with the holy hydration products!

reviews.title: Gentle exfolianat
reviews.review_text: I've been using this about twice a week for the past 3 weeks and my skin feels softer and looks glowing after every use. It's very gentle but effective. I use it on dry skin before showering and it's an easy step in my routine.

reviews.title: Fake
reviews.review_text: This is total ripoff, it’s not your dead skin that’s coming of, it has a certain type of formula that clumps up when u rub it. So basically it really does nothing for your skin at all it’s totally fake. Save your money for something better and don’t buy it.

reviews.title: Better than I ever expected
reviews.review_text: OMG I love this stuff. I have used so many different types of exfoliation product. My skin either felt stripped or was still flaky. I bought the Gentle Peeling Exfoliant because of all the great reviews, but had little faith that it would work any better than any others I have used. Man, was I wrong. I pumped some on the tips of my fingers and started lightly rubbing my cheeks. Instantly the dead skin on my face started balling up under my fingers. I rinsed off my face and patted it dry. I can't remember the last time my face felt so clean. I followed up with the Illuminating Moisturizer SPF 15. My skin looks so healthy and feels so soft. Highly recommend this product. It sells out so fast, so get it as soon as you see it in stock. I plan on buying more before I run out.

reviews.title: I love this!!!
reviews.review_text: I have super sensitive skin so I needed to find a gentle exfoliator and this is fantastic! I did a little test spot on the back of my hand and then applied to my face and it left my face so smooth without being harsh or irritating. Would highly recommend!

reviews.title: Good Exfoliant...but
reviews.review_text: This is a good exfoliant but the product stops coming out the pump after a couple of uses. I had the same issue with a 2nd bottle. The product becomes caked up inside the bottle & nothing comes out the pump. Please fix this Elf because I want to continue to buy this product!

reviews.title: Yikes
reviews.review_text: Got this product in a Christmas assortment box my mom gives me every year. She’s great at picking out skincare and makeup for me so I was super excited to try this since I have a similar, more expensive product from Tresor Rare. This product DOES exfoliate - a little too well, perhaps. Used it twice in one week and have a nasty chemical burn on my chin. I’ve never had one before in my life and it’s rough. I gave it to my sister the next day, hopefully it’s a better fit for her.

reviews.title: Works but not how you think
reviews.review_text: The fact that the cellulose in this product is what we think is dead skin balling up is simply masking the real issue. The real issue is that this is an awesome product. No, it’s not a high power exfoliating scrub, but that’s not what it says on the bottle. It says GENTLE. And it is. It does leave my face baby soft and it does minor exfoliating. Just the right amount IMO.

reviews.title: Like the Results, I hate the package
reviews.review_text: I've used this for quite a while, it did brighten my skin and help remove dead skin. But, the packaging drives me insane. It constantly clogs. Then it will spurt out in random amounts. I've started to just remove the lid, rather than pump it out. It has aggravated me to the point, that I will not rebuy due to this fact alone.

reviews.title: Best exfoliate ever
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for over a year and it is by far the best exfoliate I have used. Gentle, yet effective. I really can see results after every use. I use it about once a week, sometimes every two weeks and it just rejuvenates my skin. Love it!

reviews.title: Good peeling exfoliant
reviews.review_text: I'm repurchasing this product. It's a good budget peeling exfoliant. I notice a difference after I use it. My skin is smoother, less dull, and removes impurities. It doesn't make my blemishes completely disappear but reduces its size. I have oily skin and large pores. I have acne around that time of the month. When I first purchased it, I used it every other day but started using it once a week when I was running low. I wish it came in a larger container like a 5oz instead of 3oz.

reviews.title: Love!
reviews.review_text: I have never exfoliated my face before. I'm 38. I've been using it for a couple months now and I LOVE it. It is so quick to use and makes my skin feel so soft! Just gifted it to my friend for her bday and she loved it as well. I will always use this! Once or twice a week is perfect. Great product.

reviews.title: Amazinggg!!!!
reviews.review_text: I just got a huge order of stuff and couldn't wait to try this. You put it on a dry face which is really great and the second I started doing the circular massaging motions soooo much dead skin started coming away. This is amazing and so gentle. I've found it hard to find a project that lifts so much skin and is sooo gentle.

reviews.title: Incredible
reviews.review_text: I got this as a free mini with a purchase and honestly thought it was a gimmic at first. I figured I'd at least give it a try. Holy cow it is a game changer. My skin has never felt this good. It's so much better than using a sugar scrub. I'm obsessed with this now. I skin looks and feels happy and healthy.

reviews.title: REALLY WORKS!!!
reviews.review_text: I just got this and tried it right away. I have no idea how it works, but it literally starts taking dead skin off as soon as it hits your skin. I had no idea something like this existed! It did start to burn a little, but I rinsed it off and was fine. I also kinda wish it came with a cap but amazing product

reviews.title: Best Exfoliater
reviews.review_text: People that gave this stuff 1 star do not know what they are talking about! I used this stuff and when I saw how fast it worked I was like "No way, that can't be my skin peeling" but then I would use it again right after and there was no skin being removed! This stuff I see amazing, I already bought 4 bottles for friends!

reviews.title: CRAZY COOL
reviews.review_text: This exfoliant is fabulous. It is very gentle on the skin, and after I used it, my skin didn't feel dried out. After rubbing it around your skin for 5 seconds, little white balls of exfoliated skin start forming as you continue to massage the product in. It's crazy how well it works! I will definitely be buying this again as it isn't abrasive.

reviews.title: Amazingly Gentle
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive skin, and I was so afraid that I would have a bad reaction to a chemical exfoliant. Much to my surprise, nothing bad happened! I've used it twice now, a week apart, and no redness, no rashes, no nothing. It just makes the dead skin roll off, and rinses off. That's it! I'm so glad!

reviews.title: So Satisfying
reviews.review_text: Saw this on tiktok and ordered online. Love it and seeing it work. I use it either in the bath or before bed at the sink. Def more effective when i use it at the sink than the bath. Only down side is the pump stopped working for some reason so i had to open the pump up to use.

reviews.title: worst acne product
reviews.review_text: i used this on my face once or twice, three days apart as instructed. "gentle" is in the name so you'd assume it's safe for sensitive skin. wrong! the first time i used this, i felt the slightest tingling sensation and didn't think much. a couple tries later (after no positive results, i told myself to be patient), i put a small amount into my hands, exfoliating my whole face. my face started to burn within five seconds of contact and hives sprouted on my jawline within twenty! even a few days later, my face was still swollen. this "gentle" product gave me a chemical burn and my skin has never been worse. this is a review for this particular product. im not going to drag the whole line.

reviews.title: Neutral
reviews.review_text: This product works very well at getting rid of dry/dead skin and smoothing out the skin and leaving it super soft. Despite this fact, I've bought this product twice and both times, the product has turned into an extremelly weird, jelly, clumpy like substance that doesnt come out of the pump after about a few weeks of use.

reviews.title: Great exfoliate
reviews.review_text: This product is absolutely fantastic, very adorable and doesn't rip up your skin like sand based exfoliates. Its great on my mature skin. I gave this product 4 stars only because I only wish it was 6 or 8 oz. of product instead of only 3oz of product. I will definitely keep buying.

reviews.title: OH MY GOD I LOVE IT
reviews.review_text: I literally just got this in my order from a 50% off sale, and this product is AMAZING. I have pretty dry skin normally and I work super super hard to keep it moisturized. Sadly sometimes in the winter months my face still shows dryness, and I have tried using physical exfoliators. I used this product and oh my goodness, there was SO much dead skin that came off! I was definitely shocked by how much was on my face. This product works so so well, and my face feels 100 times softer than it did before. I would absolutely recommend this product.

reviews.title: More than your face
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with the product! I've read some negative reviews saying the stuff balling up is cellulose and not skin so I decided to really put that to the test. I've been applying it to the bottom of my left foot for the last few days while I haven't touched the right. The difference between me two feet is amazing! And I've noticed not as much "cellulose" balls up on my left foot now which leads me to believe it really is the skin that going away with it. It's definitely gotten my left foot SUMMER READY hah! I haven't used it on my face yet though - I will probably try it tonight!

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.review_text: I decided to write a review because I saw someone put that this product was balling up cellulose. If that is true, it must be taking all my dead skin with it! My face has not felt like this in years. After years of applying acne topical treatments, my face has been dry no matter how hard I would scrub. I was amazed by this product--the simplicity and effectiveness. The smell is not bad at all either. I don't even really notice much of a smell. If anything, it smells fresh. Definitely buying a lot more of this product!

reviews.title: Great product, but bad packaging/bottling
reviews.review_text: I lover to use this product, but in the first week of using it, the pump broke on me so now I have to take it out of the bottle to put it on my face. It’s absolutely helped with softness, and I’m sure mine was just a one off because every time I’ve ordered I’ve gotten great quality!

reviews.title: Gentle and effective
reviews.review_text: I bought this after seeing a few people recommend on YouTube. You apply to dry skin and the product balls up on your face, but I don’t believe it’s dead skin. However this works great at exfoliating! It’s nice and gentle, but leaves your skin glowing. I use twice a week and plan on repurchasing!

reviews.title: Product is amazing, but the pump is terrible!
reviews.review_text: I purchased this 18 months ago and the pump quit working after 3 pumps. I used the rest as best I could using the "ketchup bottle technique" to get as much as I could out of the bottle. This stuff is pretty thick, so I ended up standing it upside down for a day to get the rest out. I didn't buy more because I was mad the pump didn't work. Fast forward to a couple weeks ago, I figured the design HAD to have improved over the last year and a half, right? WRONG. Same issue- except this time the pump didn't work at all. Talk about frustrating. I love almost every other e.l.f. Cosmetics product I've tried. My suggestion to e.l.f. would be to put this in a tube to make using it way easier.

reviews.title: i was skeptical
reviews.review_text: a lot of reviews are saying that 'the pilling isnt the dead skin its just the cream itself' I thought the same so I did the process twice: rubbed it in once, cleaned off the dead skin and then immediately rubbed the cream in again. it did not ball up because the dead skin is already gone! can not recommend enough! aw well this is good for face and if you are doing your nails it will remove the cuticle as well. 12/10 need to repurchase asap! would use this once or twice a week.

reviews.title: Dupe for the Peter Thomas Roth firm x peeling gel?
reviews.review_text: This product is a quarter of the cost of Peter Thomas Roth firm x peeling gel! NO JOKE!! I will repurchase this item as long as it is being sold! PRO TIP DO NOT WET FACE B4 APPLYING PRODUCT! if you do you won't get even close to the same effect! It literally peels off all the dead dry skin. I use this every Sunday and Wednesday also do not over use its not good for you and will literally waste it. I'm so thankful for this product and I believe it's a dupe for the Peter Thomas Roth firm x exfoliant

reviews.title: Bye bye dead skin!
reviews.review_text: I exfoliate my face everyday, tone and moisturize so I was excited to see how well this would work for me. WOW! Very gentle and I cannot believe how much dead skin it removed!!! Definitely changing my skin care routine to 100% e.l.f. Thanks tiktok for the review!

reviews.title: Gentle peel
reviews.review_text: I am new to peels and wanted something mild that wouldn't leave my face burned or red. This is definitely mild and effective! I noticed a difference after the first use and it does what it says it will do. Great beginner peel or mild peel for sensitive skin.

reviews.title: Works, but I'm not sold...
reviews.review_text: I ordered this online and was so excited to recieve it! It works well and makes my skin feel and look super smooth and glowy. It's very satisfying to watch all the gunk come up as you rub - but I'm not convinced it's just skin and grime. There is way too much! I've tried this twice in one day and had the same results. I think their may be something in the product that encourages the "balling" up of product to give the appearance of a big, satisfying exfoliation - but that's just my theory.

reviews.title: This deserves a great review!
reviews.review_text: Ladies, for many, many years, I’ve used xxxxx Restorative Enzyme Peel. It’s a great product, but a pricey one. I loved it, until I tried e.l.f. Gentle Peeling Exfoliant. I’m, pleasantly, surprised at this product.....it’s a skin changer. e.l.f. Gentle Peeling Exfoliant is the best exfoliant I’ve ever used, and works, immediately! I love it. It’s made quite an impact on my mature skin. I have noticed I look fresher and younger!!!! Not only do I use it on my face, I use it on my hands. The instructions say 2-3 times a week, but I use it 4-5 times a week.

reviews.title: BEST Exfoliant EVER!!
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the BEST product for getting rid of that stubborn dry skin that doesn't go away, no matter how often you wash & moisturize your face! e.l.f. gentle peeling exfoliants are the only ones that don't irritate my sensitive skin & I feel like my face is actually CLEAN after I'm done with my skin care routine! If you have stubborn dry skin like I do, then this is the product for you!! I will never not use e.l.f. exfoliants!! Thank you so much to the e.l.f. team for making a gentle exfoliant that actually works!!

reviews.title: Great So Far!
reviews.review_text: I saw a review that said it’s not dead skin cells we’re seeing but a thickening agent. Going to have to research that. When I first put it on, I was disappointed, as I thought it would be a scrub like exfoliation, but the end result was nice. It left my face feeling soft. I had my husband (really rough skin) try it. The stuff that thickened (his dead skin or the ingredient, don’t know) was worse than what I got. It was sticking to his face and he couldn’t get it off. He used a foam cleanser to get it off. He said it felt oily. Not sure why we had different reactions to the same product. Maybe it does work some dead skin cells off, I don’t know. Maybe the ingredients didn’t mix well with his oily skin. His skin was super soft afterward compared to his usual sandpaper feel. He needs exfoliation for sure. Overall, satisfied so far, but will see after a few more uses for us both.

reviews.title: Nearly Magical
reviews.review_text: I use Retin A every night. This leaves my skin often with mild peeling. Because of the Retin A, exfoliating and/or harsh scrubbing items can cause irritation and damage. Because of this, I was hesitant to try this product and trialed on a small area. Well, OMG! This product seems to be made for Retin A users. The peeling is now invisible and the product does not cause any irritation. It’s the absolute best “go with” for all Retin A users. It’s important to follow the directions exactly for the best result. One caveat: a little goes a long way This gentle exfoliant is on my “Top Ten” beauty products of all time. You’re going to be surprised at how effective it is, whilst being so gentle.

reviews.title: Very disappointing
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive skin and only use a product like this once a week. This product is like using nothing - no palpable scrub, no suds, no scent. Doesn't do anything to my skin. Pump stopped working after a few uses. I love elf, have never been disappointed like this. ☹️

reviews.title: THIS IS AMAZING
reviews.review_text: I bought this hoping it would be a great exfoliator and man am I not disappointed! I would like to point out it is not a peel but a scrub. i tried it on my fiancé’s face first. He has super oily skin and this managed to keep it matte for HOURS! This is the first product that’s lasted more than 20 minutes. I kept just saying “wow you look great” over and over. His vote is 10/10 for oily skin. Next I tried it on my dry skin. This was just the right amount of toughness I needed on my dry spots to soften them. My skin felt amazing after. 10/10 from me.

reviews.title: Weird Product...not sure if it actually works.
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product twice a week for a few weeks now, and while I have noticed my acne clearing up, I think it may be from switching my daily cleanser and moisturizer. It feels like this product is pulling a good amount of dried skin off your face when you wash it, but I think it's just the product peeling and not actually skin. It's also very difficult to get all of the product off your skin, so I would recommend using before showering.

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.review_text: Seeing as Peeling Gel Exfoliators are all the rage I decided to give it a try! I was honestly amazed it leaves your skin feeling refreshed and cleansed with a not over-exfoliated feel. Very impressed on how this holds up to its competitors costing at least 3x as much.

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.review_text: I use this product about 2 -3 times a week along with the daily hydration moisturiser and my skin has never felt so good. My skin feels so soft and looks much clearer. This is fantastic to use and it isn't rough on the skin. Great value for the price.. I'd definitely reccomend this product

reviews.title: No whiteheads
reviews.review_text: I purchased this to use I had it sitting around for a few weeks. I decided to use it I get a lot of white heads. I used this cleanser one time for about 3 minutes I massaged my faced with the cleanser. Afterwards it was super smooth and the white heads on my nose were gone! Good product good price.... and no that’s not skin cells that balls up when you apply the cleanser to your skin that’s the formulation of the cleanser smh

reviews.title: VERY effective yet no damage.
reviews.review_text: Scared the mess outta me first time I used this peel cuz it worked very well and shed tons of crud off my face. I was nervous that my skin would be tight or burnt like other similar products have caused for me.. but no, everything was intact, no damage or dryness, just smooth and soft skin. It's awesome.

reviews.title: LISTEN
reviews.review_text: I have tried a lot of exfoliants because I have really dry skin. Unfortunately most of them have irritated my skin and dry patches that become super noticeable when I put on makeup. I was thinking this was going to be similar but WOW! The dead skin rolls of you without any effort! All those dry patches are just, POOF! Gone! I was so shocked I kept wondering what I'd been using all this time, and why none of it worked on the same level of this one. I even passed it along to my mom who kept talking about how smooth my face looked, and she asked me to buy her a bottle for her own!

reviews.title: LOVE THE PRODUCT, HATE THE PUMP!
reviews.review_text: I llllllove this exfoliant. I hope it never goes away, but the pump for it does not work! Every time I buy it, I pump and pump and pump and maybe a tiny bit comes out, but I eventually give up and unscrew it and try to get it out just bashing the container against my palm. It's ridiculous. I have yet to receive one that works.

reviews.title: Love the feeling!
reviews.review_text: Bought this a month ago and have been using it to compare with a more expense named brand exfoliant that I have been using. I can say I like the feel and texture of this one better and I can truly see it working. When I wash my face I can feel that it is smooth and amazing feeling.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.review_text: This stuff is so good!!! The price is phenomenal, but the results are incredible. Iam a new E.L.F user. I've tried expensive brands and I must say, elf is my favorite. I am now a multiple product user. Please come up with a line/wrinkle filler. I'm 57 and need one. Thanks elf!!!

reviews.title: First skin exfoliator that works for me!
reviews.review_text: I haven't used any exfoliating shrubs in years on the advice of a dermatologist. So, when I saw this product, I had to try it it. I have rosacea which can cause flaky skin, and this exfoliator works very well in smoothing my skin without irritating it. This is a holy trail product for me!

reviews.title: Amazing! My whole family is obsessed
reviews.review_text: I bought this when it was on sale on black friday just to try it out, and i’m so happy i did! the first time i tried it i was shocked and appalled at how much skin came off! i introduced this to both my mother and my sister, who regularly steal it from my bathroom. i also told all my friends about it because this product is truly amazing, and super affordable! also, about the bottle, i can say that after a month of use every other day it hasn’t been misbehaving at all! maybe there are just some faulty bottles, or it comes along later :) can’t wait for it to go on sale again so i can buy it for all my freinds and family!!

reviews.title: Amazing cleanser
reviews.review_text: From the first use I could see and feel a difference, my skin felt super smooth, clean and soft after use. I have used this a few times now and will continue to do so. I have combination skin with an oily t zone and this cleanser has already started to reduce the oils on my face. Can’t get over how good this cleanser is, one of the best I’ve tried!

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: Bought this hoping it would help me with my dry skin. Most products leave my skin drier and peeling. This removes the skin and doesn’t leave me itchy and ashy. This with a vitamin C oil has left my face baby smooth and bright! 1000% in my must have kit from now on.

reviews.title: Product worked like a charm/Pump did not.
reviews.review_text: Just got it! I've been sloughing pretty regularly do to using Retin-A and this polished my skin beautifully; soft and supple results. However... I had to finally unscrew the top to get at the product, the pump was a bust. Will have to move it into another pump or get a long, tiny bowled spoon to use it. Can wait to see if the results last and last. I've already recommended this product to friends!

reviews.title: OBSESSED
reviews.review_text: I tried this for the first time tonight. WOWOWOWOWOWOW. You literally could see your dry skin peeling off, oddly satisfying. After I rinsed my face and padded dry I was amazed! My face which is normally dry felt the softest it's been in years!!! Buy this product if you have dry skin, I promise you you won't be let down!!

reviews.title: Hard to use
reviews.review_text: I really wasn't sure what the best way was to use this since it rolls up immediately when you try spread it with your fingers. There was so much product stuck in the bottom half of the bottle that I ended up using the pump stick as an applicator, which I recommend to get the product to cover your face without it pilling right away. It smells good, but I prefer liquid exfoliants since they're easier to wash off.

reviews.title: game changer
reviews.review_text: This stuff is awesome. It's so easy and quick to use and it makes my skin feel so smooth after. Dead skin and clogged pores are no match! I also have light scarring on my cheeks from acne, but I haven't been able to get rid of it. Using this before I put scar cream on has really made a difference in fading them more!

reviews.title: Great addition to my routine. Give it a chance.
reviews.review_text: I've been using this exfoliant for a few months now and I am quite pleased with the results. I've noticed fewer breakouts in my problem areas when I use it consistently (every 2-3 days, usually before a shower). It's lasting well even tho I use a pretty liberal amount of it. The spout does clog up if you aren't keeping it clean but only on the outside so just wipe the dried bit off and you're good to go! Don't even have to open it up. I saw a lot of reviews complaining that the product is a scam because it balls up when you rub it in to look like you're sloughing off dead skin but I don't think that's the intension. It's not a trick, the balled up bits are what give your skin the gentle scrub without being harsh or grainy! I believe it is the physical component that helps to exfoliate the dead skin cells. I've also seen people complain about not being able to get the little bits off or it sticking in their peach fuzz. I have never had this problem as I always use my usual face wash (the Elf jelly coconut cleanser ♥! ) afterwards to wash it all off and it works perfectly!

reviews.title: Gentle, but able to do the job.
reviews.review_text: This is a staple of my morning routine. I’ll admit, I hated the first bottle I ever got. It was the bottle, not the product that was the issue. The pump broke after 3 day so fuse. But the product itself is truly gentle. I can use it everyday and it doesn't irritate my skin and it cleans away the rough skin that develops due to extreme heat & weather.

Mind Blown!! I have combo skin that's also sensitive, so my pores get clogged, my skin looks dull & scrubs irritate any blemishes. The second I rubbed this on my skin, my hands were COVERED in tons of dead skin! I assure you it's NOT just product balling up, I thought that too at first... So I kept repeating the process until it stopped happening! During the last application, areas I'd worked on longer had no more skin slough off, areas I hadn't rubbed as long had a bit more. I even did my husband's hand to show him! He now has one silky hand & one rough one lol. I've tried microderm, facials, other products & NOTHING worked this effectively. Wrinkles are less visible & my make up went on silky smooth! To the people who think it's just a gimmick, you're really missing out... Me & my now flawless face are gonna go out & buy some more!

reviews.title: I see why it is called a "holy grail!"
reviews.review_text: Amazing! I have VERY sensitive skin. In just one use, I woke up to skin that was glowing. My redness was reduced and my pores appeared to be minimized. No issues with application. I did use in shower on damp skin not dry. I didn't use foundation this morning because my skin looked so good!

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.review_text: I used this for the first time today in the shower and WOW! I love it. Initially, it went on creamy and after rubbing in circular motions for a few seconds I felt the micro-particles....very micro and gently exfoliating, I actually felt the dead skin loosening from my face. It all easily washed away while showering. Afterwards, my face felt baby soft. The product smells fresh and clean as well. This is the BEST exfoliator I have ever used in my life! No joke.

reviews.title: A Staple in my skin care
reviews.review_text: I recently bought my third bottle of this lovely stuff. It's extremely effective and the value can't be beat. I find that physical scrubs and cream scrubs can be too abrasive. This formula lives up to it's name, it's gentle without sacrificing efficiency. I use this twice a week followed by a good moisturizer.

reviews.title: Fantastic product!
reviews.review_text: I am using regularly this gentle exfoliator and my skin condition improved so much. Minimise the pores, fights blemishes and achnes. It's best to use it in the evening, follow by recovery night cream. This duo works wonders together. Again great dedgon of the bottle allows to use the product to the very end, without a need of scraping, squeezing to the very last drop. Great product!

reviews.title: Weird, but I’m a good way
reviews.review_text: OK I am giving this product four stars because I really do like the results that it gave my skin. My skin felt glowy, refreshed, hydrated, and smooth after use. Very deeply cleansed, too, and so much fun to use. However the smell is kind of weird- almost like a combination of pencil lead and citrus? Also the dispenser kept clogging every single time I tried to use it so I ended up just unscrewing the cap and digging it out.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.review_text: I just got this and it is great. You can feel the skin immediately exfoliating. No rubbing or scrubbing. I like doing it at night so that I can put on my night cream and my skin drinks it in! I have sensitive skin and it doesn't irritate my face at all.

reviews.title: so smooth!
reviews.review_text: I got this in the mini mask set and OMG, I love it! I put it on in the shower and, at first, I thought it was a joke because it just disappeared into my skin...I kept scrubbing in circular motions and after maybe 30 seconds I could feel the dead skin balling up under my fingers, amazing. If you have dry skin, definitely follow up with a moisturizer because you will be DRY...but so smooth and soft.

reviews.title: Cellulose
reviews.review_text: First things first, I love this product. After using it, my face feels so good and glowy. I will continue using this product but this is where my review gets interesting. I saw DaniHMcV's review discussing how the stuff balling up while using this is not skin (like I thought) but the microcrystalline cellulose that's listed in the ingredients! So, as a scientist who has access to microscopes, I obviously had to find out if this was true! I rubbed some of the cream onto my hand and mounted the balled up things in question onto a slide with some hydrochloric acid. It is largely cellulose! So this is why I deducted a star from my review. I love how this product feels and what it does for my skin but it's pretty clear that the cellulose balling up is misleading consumers. No, it's not sloughing off this much skin every time you use it, which is probably a good thing. But it is a gentle chemical exfoliant which is what I was hoping for.

reviews.title: My face loves it!!!
reviews.review_text: Omg!!! This is an awesome product. I never imagined that I would have so much dead skin to be removed from my face. When I used this product, it worked right away and my dead skin started work its way off. After rinsing my face and blotting it dry, my face not only felt revived and refreshed, it was sooooo smooth and soft to the touch. I had no irritation or side effects whatsoever. I will definitely buy this again and use as a staple to my daily facial regimen. Thanks ELF!

reviews.title: A gimmick you say? Nope!
reviews.review_text: I've seen similar Asian branded products before I discovered this, and boy is it awesome! At first, I thought this product was just an overplayed trick, but I felt my skin BEFORE using it, and wow is it soft!! I use this product twice a week for the last two months, and it has really made a difference. I think it's a fun product!

reviews.title: Can't live without this!!
reviews.review_text: I have absolutely fallen in love with this product. It really does take off all the dead skin because you can see it being removed in balls. And after rinsing, my skin was so unbelievably soft. I have to admit I've only used this once, but I know I'll be using this again and again.

reviews.title: genuinely best exfoliating product ive used
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many different exfoliating products and they consistently are either too harsh or simply just don't work and this one is so gentle, but works so well. It doesn't have any of rough things (like sugar) and it is so good I will be using this for the rest of my life

reviews.title: Great for my acne prone skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve suffered with hormonal cystic acne now for a few years due to my PCOS and my skin has been left with scars especially on both my cheeks, I’ve used all sorts of cleansing products medications and whatever but in the end I’ve just been using baby wipes to take my makeup off as I’ve never known any product to help my skin, starting using elf products for a couple of months or so and came across this, I’ve used it for for a few weeks and my skin is clearing up majorly. I don’t use anything other than wipes so I know it’s down to this product, can barely see the scars on my one cheek. Going to keep using this and see if my other cheek improves. Only down fall is the pump has never worked, seen this issue from quite a few reviews but I can’t really moan considering the price, well worth it.

reviews.title: Makes My Face Feel So Soft
reviews.review_text: I bought this about a month ago, and I use it 2-3 times a week. I really enjoy the soft feeling after using it, like the dead skin truly has been removed. It doesn't leave my skin dried out or overly oil- I have really oily skin so this has been great!

reviews.title: My face is so smooth and soft
reviews.review_text: Found this product on the internet as a replacement for a discontinued product it is perfect. Easy to use and having very sensitive skin I had no reaction. Leaves the skin soft and smooth and as a bonus my lines by my eyes appear finer an extra bonus I was not expecting. Highly recommended.

reviews.title: Product viscosity not compatible with dispenser.
reviews.review_text: I was looking forward to using a product that would gently exfoliate my skin without being overly abrasive and cause irritation. I have more to say about trying to get the product out of the bottle than about the actual product itself! After getting it out of the box, I twisted the pump to dispense the product on my hand but after 10-15 pumps, nothing came out. I took the pump off the bottle and noticed that the product was very thick so I decided to shake up the bottle and try again. After several more pumps, no product would come out. I again took the top off and turned the bottle upside down to tap on the palm of my hand to get the product out that way…still a no go. I could hear the product in the bottle as I shook it and it sounded like slurpy jello. I had to take the pump and wiggle the tube around in the product to break it up and then it took a lot to shake out only a few plops of product. At this point, I was so annoyed with all the effort it took to get a dime size amount of the product out, that I did a few quick circles on my cheeks and then washed it off. I should've purchased the travel size that was in a squeeze tube, I'm sure that would've made the product much easier to get out! I won't waste my time with this product again.

reviews.title: My skin has never felt cleaner!
reviews.review_text: I couldn't wait to try this product! I JUST received this 30 minutes ago. I was hoping it would do what it said and OH MY GOSH! My skin has never felt cleaner. It cleared away all my flakey dry skin. I wanted to see if the product was itself pilling by applying it to my hand, it only pilled on my face. I tried it on my neck as well. The product feels like lotion, there is no grittiness, none whatsoever. Thank you ELF for creating such incredible quality products at such incredibly reasonable prices. You make beauty and skincare attainable for every age, skin type and person! I'm a fan...atic!

AMAZING! I have dry skin around my nose, speciacally around my nose stud. It didnt matter how much face lotion i used or whag face wash i used, nothing would get rid of the dry skin! My foundation would cake and flake up and just looked awful. The FIRST time using this, i saw just how amazing this product is and it Works! I will forver have a bottle of this on hand!!!

reviews.title: New favorite skin care product!!
reviews.review_text: At first I was nervous to try this product becuase I have sensitive skin. I know the product label says gentle peeling exfoliant but it's not always the case for most skin care products. With this product I made sure my face was clean and dry before applying and rubbing in the product. When I put alittle of the product on my face, and rubbed it in circular motions, the dead skin came off right away! When I was done, my face was not irritated and it felt so soft! I'm definitely using this product 2x a week! Do not hesitate and buy it!

reviews.title: Best Stuff Eva'!!!
reviews.review_text: I have always had problems with dry skin & dry skin patches all over my face. I have used mechanical exfoliating but still those patches persist. NO MORE!!! I used ELF's chemical exfoliate and my skin has never looked so soft and healthy. it is harsh enough to remove the layers of dead skin without burning my very sensitive skin. I love it!!!

This has become my go-to peeling exfoliant! I tried using other high end brands, and I believe that this ELF brand definitely works just as well. And for a better price! Who doesn't love that?! If you have sensitive skin, do be careful to not over exfoliate. I did that a few times because I felt like there were parts that did not get exfoliated enough, and it caused my skin to be very red and a little patchy. For me personally, I do not use it more than once a week. I agree with some of the other reviews in regards to it get clogged. Just the tip got clogged even when turn it to the closed position. A hard pump got it working, so it's not a major issue for me and I'll still continue to purchase it.

reviews.title: Absolutely loooove
reviews.review_text: I know a lot of people are a little triggered about the cellulose in this. No it is not dead skin, but the cellulose here is what helps with the exfoliation by pilling up and gently scrubbing your face. This stuff leaves my face baby smooth and I cannot reccommend it more highly!

reviews.title: Best exfoliator ever!
reviews.review_text: I'm throwing out my mesh facial scrubbers, brushes and abrasive scrubs. This is the best product I've ever used for exfoliating. I've tried similar products with the fruit enzymes in them that were way more expensive and they didn't work as well as this and were difficult to use because they would ball up in my fine facial hair. This doesn't. Super pleasant to use, fast (doesn't need to sit on the skin for any length of time), shockingly effective, and unbelievably affordable. This is THE product I've been searching for my whole life. I've just purchased 2 more bottles.

reviews.title: Glowing Review for a Glowing Face
reviews.review_text: This was bought as I gift to me, and I thought it was high end until I realized it was it was elf. It left my face smooth and glowing. A while back my sister bought a spray that does the same thing, but costs 5 times the amount the amount of this. That said, it did make the dry spots of my face flaky, but as long as you moisturize that's no problem. Back to the positive, you can use this all over your body. It worked miracles on my feet. Thanks Elf once again!

reviews.title: Good, when I can get it out of the bottle
reviews.review_text: This is a much more economical version of another brand I used to use. The issue I have is that I have to take the top off when I want to use it; it's too thick for the pump. Outside of that, I love that it's not harsh and I can use it 2x a week for a quick fresh face pick-me-up.

reviews.title: I love this mask
reviews.review_text: I originally ordered thinking it was another "cover your face, wait X amt of time and wash off" to my wonderful surprise it's actually more of a chemical peel! After using it for the first time my face was glowing, my pores were less noticeable and my skin felt so soft and clean. Comes in a 3 Oz option for home and and a .9 Oz tube for traveling

reviews.title: Really worked for me.
reviews.review_text: I bought 1 bottle a few weeks ago and was quite surprised how well it worked. I am 71 years old and after using it for the first time, my face looked and felt smoother. I am a little confused by the negative reviews because I have used it 5 -6 times and still get excellent results. So pleased that i purchased 3 more bottles, 1 for me and the other 2 for my besties.

reviews.title: EXACTLY AS DESCRIBED
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product. I washed my face of makeup as usual as my nightly routine. I then made sure my skin was completly dry so as to try the Gentle Peeling Exfoliant. I then only pumped out a small amount onto my first gers to jusy try out on my forehead. I gently rubbed it onto my forehead and the result was instantaneous! I slowly rolled away what was apparently left over residue of my foundation and some dead skin. It looked almost like I had put school glue on and rolled away the residue, but I could feel the tiniest of grainness exfoliating my skin. I tried it Lloyd over my face after my forehead. I the gently washed my face with warm water as instructed. My face felt so smooth and clean! Will buy this product again!

reviews.title: MY FAVORITE
reviews.review_text: This is a great product. I have been exfoliating using all sorts of scrubs and microdermabrasion formulations. That didn't help to get rid of all of that dry flaky skin on my face. This does the trick!! It is very mild. No stinging or burning or irritation. You put this on your skin when it is dry, and when you massage it in with your hands, all of that dead skin combines with this and sloughs off, leaving smooth, fresh skin beneath. It is AMAZING. I am 41 years old and my skin is going through some age related changes, and this has not caused me any more issues with this. I love this product. If there was ONE negative thing I HAD to say about it, it would be the smell. It is not gross, but not pleasant either. But it is not a big deal.

reviews.title: New Obsession
reviews.review_text: I am in AWE of this product!! I used to use a similar product (The Body Shop's Drops of Youth™ Liquid Peel). However, I really enjoy the ELF product way more. Not only is it more budget friendly, but it also doesn't have a super chemical smell. It's so satisfying to watch the dead skin ball up and come off of your face. Afterwards, I really feel like my skin absorbs the hydrating serum and daily moisturizers SO much better! I have worked this into my skincare routine 2-3 times a week, and haven't even had to wear foundation these last few weeks. I am overly pleased!

reviews.title: Gentle
reviews.review_text: At 55 plus I'm more conscience of my skin and what I put on it. This is the first time using this cleansing product and I find it to be gentle on my skin without harsh abrasions or chemicals. I use this 3 times a week and found my skin to be clearer and glowing and soft.

reviews.title: Awesome product, terrible packaging
reviews.review_text: I have terribly dry skin, with uncontrollable amounts of flaking in the winter. It's always been a very fragile balance between sloughing off enough of the dryness to keep my pores clear (and makeup not looking gross on the uneven surface), and not causing extra irritation in cold/dry weather. This stuff... WORKS. The popular critical review about the clumping agent was almost a relief, since it caused pilling just on my hands and I was terrified of how powerful it seemed. Regardless of the pilling factor being a hoax, my face can be nearly engulfed by flakiness before and then be nearly entirely smooth after use. Without the acne medication so common in other more irritating exfoliants, my skin has been fine using this even three times a week. It /is/ important to apply with dry hands on dry skin, as is listed on the bottle, not with wet skin like the website says. The only drawback is that the pump stopped working after three weeks, and I'll have to attempt transferring it to a tube soon. If it came in a tube instead I would be more than thrilled, but let's be real, I'm already going to be buying this over and over again.

reviews.title: Better than any other exfoliater
reviews.review_text: The scrubs that you squeeze out of a tube don’t have a uniform consistency and you end up with more scrub on one side of your face than the other. Since this goes on dry you can control what parts of your face are getting scrubbed. Oh and yes it definitely get rid of the dead skin.

reviews.title: Works on sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this gentle keeling exfoliant for a few months and REALLY love it. I was suddenly wrestling with very sensitive skin (at 69 yrs of age). Everything irritated it and cause breakouts & burning. I think putting avocado oil in my moisturizer helped heal my face… HOWEVER, this has done a great job of gently exfoliating without irritation. For those having trouble with the pump, the luau id dries in the exposed end. Try rinsing the opening after using or you may have to prime the pump a while. It works great for me and I am thankful.

reviews.title: amazinggggg
reviews.review_text: OH MY GOD! this is truly a miracle product!!! it is a gentle cream/serum-y thing that when you put on ur skin allllll the dead skin comes off. it is super gentle and helps with my acne, dryness, texture. it is so good i highly reccomend especially for the price

reviews.title: Pointless
reviews.review_text: Not sure what the purpose is. You just rub the solution on your face and rub until you get a whole bunch of debris falling everywhere. It seems like you're doing something for your skin, but to me you're just rubbing the dried up product off your face. Nah

reviews.title: Gentle.powerful.perfect!
reviews.review_text: This is by far my all time favorite product! It's so amazing!it feels like it works magic! It not only does exactly what it says it delivers the kind of results other products promise but don't come close to the unbelievable "exfoliation" that you can literally see and feel the dead skin and build up "peel" away "gently!"without the harsh irritation of other products and peels.

reviews.title: Totally worth the hype, it works immediately!
reviews.review_text: I'm not a big reviewer, but I want everyone to know how great this product is. I'm not getting paid for this review, and I certainly didn't get the product for free. The first time I used it, I was amazed how much dead skin came off with very little scrubbing, and it didn't hurt in the slightest. It has very little smell (if any), which is a plus because I am sensitive to fragrances. It leaves my face feeling so smooth and shiny, which I personally like. After having two facials in the last year and both estheticians telling me I have great skin but need to exfoliate more often, I finally listened and added this product to my routine. I will be a lifelong user, so please don't discontinue, E.L.F.!!!!

reviews.title: A Definite repurchase!
reviews.review_text: Ireceived a couple of these last week and went to wash my face then pat dry then apply the lotion type texture to my skin and I didn't use alot.....a few dabs all over. When rubbing in the lotion there is a slight chemical smell but that's the Exfoliant. Tiny tiny balls of dirt were rolling off my skin. WOW ELF, I'm very impressed! The information on the box/bottle reads to use 2-3 times a week and that's enough for me. My skin was exceptionally softer after each use. No redness or irritation and my combination skin can get sensitive so this is another great hit in a 90ml bottle from e.l.f.

reviews.title: Works hard, not harsh
reviews.review_text: This stuff works wonders without leaving my skin dry! I've used other exfoliants that claim to be easier on the skin, but can still make my face burn. There is absolutely nothing like this for the price. I use this every other day in the shower and my skin is super smooth and takes makeup on well after use.

reviews.title: Absolute magic for my skin!
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. What I love about it is that there is no grit in here. When you apply it to your skin, (I use on my face, neck, and decollete) rub it around and immediately it starts to exfoliate the dead skin. It leaves my skin so smooth and soft and it is just a miraculous product. I coordinate using this product the morning after I use my prescription Retin-A the night before (4x per week) to get all the dead skin off. I'm so glad that I read the other reviews on this product and I won't buy any other exfoliator other than this.

reviews.title: By far the best exfoliator I have ever used
reviews.review_text: Not only is this fairly priced but it works amazing. The moment you put it on the skin it starts to work. I use it 2-3 times a week and it makes my skin feel amazing. I have pretty dry and sensitive skin but I had no reactions to this and my family loves it too. If you're thinking about getting it, get it!! Sometimes they're out of stock

reviews.title: Great peel, bad dispenser!!
reviews.review_text: The peel is great, i have pretty oily skin and this does a good job leaving my face feeling nice and clean - though it’s not a cleanser. The dispenser, though, it’s super well crafted and is clogged, so it’s been really hard for me to take advantage of the product. So the packaging definitely gets in the way of the product, which is too bad :(

reviews.title: Best Ever!
reviews.review_text: These exfoliating cloths are truly the best I've ever used. . . and I've tried innumerable brands, none of which left me felt cleansed, much less smooth and not irritated! I kept looking for them everywhere, but apparently just could not see them. Am stocking up now because I don't think there's a better product or value, anywhere.

reviews.title: Highly recommended
reviews.review_text: I love this exfoliate. Gentle on skin I continued to rub the product in small circles where I have dark spots and the dead skin started sloughing off. Skin feels so clean and soft after use. I used it twice the same night and left it on around a minute while still barely rubbing and again the dead skin was coming off. I'm going to use it every other day. After 2 uses I can tell a difference.

reviews.title: So disappointed
reviews.review_text: Was really excited to try this based on the description and the reviews. I literally can not believe how many people think that it's actually dead skin that is balling up. It is CLEARLY the formula. As soon as it makes contact with my skin, it's rolled up in tiny balls before I even get to really rub it in. There is no exfoliating what so ever with this product. Again, can't believe how many people actually think that is skin instead of the product. :|

reviews.title: Love It!!
reviews.review_text: I was slightly skeptical buying this but figured I love the other elf skincare products so why not? It does what it's intended to do and you immediately see the dead skin ball up with the product. Gently exfoliates and doesn't hurt my sensitive skin like other exfoliants do. There is a weird smell which I don't like but I just wash my face after with the daily face cleanser and it goes away.

reviews.title: OK WAIT YES
reviews.review_text: I just bought this and have dry and sensitive skin and this felt amazing on it! It exfoliated my dry skin without being rough, it didn’t leave my skin dried out, and it didn’t make my skin red or itchy. Major win! I love it so much. I followed with a toner, serum, and moisturizer as usual. No issues!

reviews.title: Newborn baby soft skin!
reviews.review_text: This product is wonderful! I am 69 years old and had extremely dry facial skin. I read a review on this Walmart product in which the reviewer said her skin was dry until after using this exfoliant and decided to try it- such a good price I couldn't resist! You use a few drops onto either wet or dry skin and "voila"! Dry skin sloughs off in tiny balls! I did this 3 times on my face making sure to get close to the hairline and even unto my neck. You rub as directed in small circles then rinse with warm water, dry the skin and repeat I would say no more than 2 times-less if you have sensitive skin. But my skin was so dry that it took 3 repeating rounds to get off all the dry skin. I was left with NEWBORN BABY SOFT SKIN!!! It felt so soft. I applied my usual moisturiser and my skin was still soft 3 days later! The directions say to use 1-2 times per week and I will follow that regime. The results are amazing-no more over-priced exfoliants with tiny beads in them-they do nothing compared to e.l.f. Gentle Peeling Exfoliant! Men and younger people with dry skin would benefit from this product too. I will use it on my hands, neck and upper chest that are my dry skin areas. I am ordering another bottle (even thought I think a whole bottle will last 4-8 weeks at least) just in case e.l.f. decides to raise the price based on these great reviews!
