Thank you e.l.f. for this great product and all your other products. And thank you Walmart for keeping prices low for hard working Americans.

reviews.title: Brightens and smooths skin
reviews.review_text: I recently discovered this product and I'm very happy with it's performance. It has no sting or burn when applied. It also doesn't have any gritty texture. It does an amazing job of removing dead skin cells and brightening your skin. It also leaves my skin texture smooth and soft. Its so gentle and non irritating, I can use it every other day with no problems.

reviews.title: I want to love this
reviews.review_text: I guess my skin is just to sensitive and dry for this. I was hoping to exfoliate all the dry skin off but it was made worse. My skin became red, extremely dry and angry. It’s been over a week now and I tried again and the same thing happened. This isn’t friendly for dry sensitive skin

reviews.title: A must for girls with sensitive and oily skin!
reviews.review_text: I am revamping my skin care routine because I'm now in my 30's and have noticed my skin needs have shifted. I LOVE me some luxury skin care products, but also like to save where I can and really...the beauty market has changed a lot and the results we are getting with the expensive lines, the more affordable lines are bringing their A game to compete. ELF is definitely a competitor! I just ordered several skin care products from this line for the first time and this little gem was one of them. It will be a constant in my skin care routine from now on!!! Along with the bounce back jelly cleaner and the mineral face primer, I plan on buying this over and over again. I have fair, sensitive, combination oily/acne prone skin. I have turned my skin red from harsh scrubbing on more than one occasion trying to improve my texture, chemical peels, etc, you name it, I've done it without being too extreme. I tried this product this morning and after one time of using it, I already see a difference. Nothing burned my skin, my skin already looked brighter from the removal of dead skin and looks smoother- before my primer. I plan on using this about twice a week, but girls, if you are looking for a non abrasive option to helping your skin look clear, brighter and smoother and you have oily and sensitive skin???... this is it. Do yourself a favor and try this product. You will not regret it.

reviews.title: Smooth skin!!
reviews.review_text: My skin feels soooooo smooth after I use this!! I use this a couple times a week and it doesn't irritate my skin at all (take into account that I don't have sensitive skin and my skin easily tolerates daily use of a glycolic acid toner). Since starting my current skin care regimen I have (about 4-6 months ago) I have noticed dramatic improvement in my skins texture and I feel this product has contributed to that improvement.

reviews.title: Most effective gentle exfoliant I've found
reviews.review_text: I think some people don't understand this product. Yes, all the stuff you see when you "roll" it off is not your skin -- but it helps remove the dead cells. It's not a scam, it just works differently than other products. I notice an immediate difference in my skin tone and texture after using this, and it's gentle enough to use on sensitive skin. I particularly like it for the KP I get on my upper arms, but I also use it on my face when I need some refreshing but can't use my go-to glycolic acid peels. Good value too, because a little bit goes a long way.

reviews.title: Fab product
reviews.review_text: This is a very gentle product that left my skin feeling smooth and soft, I love it!

reviews.title: Gentle!!!
reviews.review_text: This is a gentle exfoliant that is easy to use and works good!

reviews.title: Pump broke quickly
reviews.review_text: The pump stopped working after a day or two but the formula itself is really nice.

reviews.title: Smooth skin
reviews.review_text: Used this for the first time tonight and it made my skin so smooth afterwards!
So gentle yet makes my skin feel amazing!!can be used several times a week I feel as it's not harsh

reviews.title: Why isn't this viral?
reviews.review_text: A dupe for Boscia exfoliant. I use this about 3 times a week in the shower and at night if I find a dry patch from retinol. Does not irritate skin!!!

reviews.title: Pump useless
reviews.review_text: Very difficult to get the product out as the pump didn't work. So wasted most of it as couldn't get it out!

reviews.title: Best Exfoliation Ever
reviews.review_text: No exaggeration, after one use I was a believer. My skin looks 15 years younger. Buy it. Buy it now!

reviews.title: Skin feels great
reviews.review_text: Although the product is great, the pump is awful. I see from the reviews that this hasn't been improved.

reviews.title: excellent exfoliant
reviews.review_text: This really works well and love the way my skin looks and feels after using. I use it 2 - 3 times a week. Will definitely buy again.

reviews.title: Love!!
reviews.review_text: Love love love this !!! After I put it my skin looked bright and so glowy! I even had my mom try it and she loved it and had me buy her one too!!

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.review_text: I loved the way this product worked. Your can really tell your face was clean & smooth. But the pump stopped working. I had to open the bottle & stick my finger in their. LOL!

reviews.title: Love this!
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for a couple of weeks now, and I love it! My skin feels so soft and smooth, and has a great glow. My skin looks great for my age. So far no problems with the bottle as others have reported.

reviews.title: Best Exfoliant Ever!
reviews.review_text: This is definitely the best exfoliator I've ever used. It's not harsh on the skin but works instantly to get the dead skin off and leave the skin silky smooth.

reviews.title: Great Dupe
reviews.review_text: I used to use a product from a company that no longer exists. The Gentle Peeling Exfoliant is a great replacement for that product and even less expensive! It is super gentle and removes dead skin with ease.

reviews.title: Oddly satisfying
reviews.review_text: This product was odd at first as it starts to “pill” right away, but I guess that's just how it's supposed to work. My skin feels so smooth and soft after applying this and I don't feel as though I've used any harsh chemicals to achieve this.

reviews.title: Holy Grail!
reviews.review_text: I have EXTREMELY flaky skin. Nothing has worked on it, including products from dermatologist. This clears it up about 90%! I can wear foundation without being self conscious

reviews.title: Rids of so much dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product sloughs off so much dry skin, it’s insane. I have naturally dry, flaky skin so a good exfoliator is a must, and this one doesn’t dry me out further. I use this 2-3 times weekly for a smooth and refreshed glow. I highly recommend!

reviews.title: Gentile and Effective
reviews.review_text: Because this exfoliant was gentler than I'm used to, I didn't think it would work, but I was wrong. Using this 3x/week on my dry, sensitive skin has made my skin look and feel amazing. The smell is fantastic too!

reviews.title: Amazing!!!
reviews.review_text: I seriously just bought this today and i used it and my skin feels so soft! My skin did not react at all and my skin is pretty sensitive so i am so so pleased!!

reviews.title: Yes!
reviews.review_text: I love the gentle peeling exfoliant- for real, on my 3rd bottle. I have extremely sensitive skin and was hesitant at first, but after reading reviews I had to try. Best part: leaves my skin soooo smooth without drying my face more!

reviews.title: Love this stuff
reviews.review_text: There is something about this that is very satisfying when you use it. Good product for the price. My only complaint would be the dispenser - it's on the thick side and sometimes hard to pump.

reviews.title: Amazing product! (Not a bot)
reviews.review_text: This gentle peeling exfoliant is soo good and works amazing! The only thing I dislike is the smell, it's not strong but smells…off. But I would totally recommend this and it's supper cheap!

reviews.title: I don't like this as an exfoliant
reviews.review_text: When I think of exfoliant, I think of something with granules in it that get massaged into the skin. This isn't that. It doesn't even lather so I don't feel like it does anything for me.

reviews.title: Great Product
reviews.review_text: I really like this one. The smell is even nice. Can see my dry skin balling up as I use it, not just the product balling up, but can actually see flaky spots being removed

reviews.title: Gentle but effective exfoliation.
reviews.review_text: I received This product complementary with an order that I placed. I never would have ordered it on my own, but I'm so glad they sent the sample. It is an amazing product and I have since went back and Replenished with full-size product.

reviews.title: LOVE it
reviews.review_text: Ive been using this for about two weeks and OH MY i love it so much! I thought something that would cause my skin to peel would dry it out but my skin has never been softer, honestly!

reviews.title: Makes my skin feel so good
reviews.review_text: I love this exfoliant. It's so gentle but so effective. I love being able to use this a couple of times a week without my skin being irritated. A definite keeper in my regimen.

reviews.title: So gentle a scrub you can actually use.
reviews.review_text: This is the most gentle exfoliant I have ever used. I has stopped using scrubs on the advice of my DERM> I am over 50 and my thinning skin can't handle it anymore. This one is so soft yet so effective I absolutely LOVE IT>

reviews.title: This definitely works
reviews.review_text: I decided to give this a try because I needed a new exfoliater and I really am glad I did. It smells so good and leaves my skin feeling SO soft and glowy. I think this is a great product for the price.

reviews.title: Great exfoliat!!! Terrible bottle
reviews.review_text: I love this exfoliat- it really is fantastic. I’ve bought it at least 5 times but the bottle and pump are the worst. The pump always gets clogged- please change the packing!

reviews.title: love it
reviews.review_text: this stuff is so good. I use 2 pumps every now and then for spa days to really exfoliate. I always feel super smooth afterwards and skin care/ masks absorbs so much more efficiently after I use this!

reviews.title: The end to dead skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this three months ago and im very impressed. It removes all the dead skin very gently. I appreciate this because i have sensitive skin. Its not sticky or smelly. It's magic in a bottle.

reviews.title: Great for feet too
reviews.review_text: I don’t know if this product was meant for feet (heels) but it works wonders on my dry heels. It was by accident that i discovered this. I dropped some on my heel and while removing it i noticed it removing the dead skin from my heels.

the pump didn't work for me which is a downfall, but i went ahead and used it. & it felt amazing on my skin. it's super gentle on the skin. i've used others and it's made my skin red and irritated but not this one.

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.review_text: This stuff is great! I previously used a physical exfoliator every day but this is way more effective 3x a week. It makes my skin feel soft and clean.

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.review_text: You know how your skin feels a little rough when it is dry or dehydrated? This product takes care of that, leaving my skin silky smooth. My skin is on the sensitive skin, and this is gentle and does not irritate it.

reviews.title: Soft Skin
reviews.review_text: I use this 1-2 time per week. The product is fantastic and leaves my skin soft and refreshed every time. I have had less breakouts since using this. My only complaint is the dispenser portion broke and it's difficult to get the product out.

reviews.title: love it!!
reviews.review_text: this is my favorite exfoliator hands down, nothing beats this. I'm so sad I haven't been able to find it ANYWHERE. I've looked online and in store and I've had no luck. Hoping this is restocked soon and isn't discontinued.

reviews.title: Great product!
reviews.review_text: I've been searching for something like this for so long. It's gentle and smells good. It removes all of the dead skins on my face without causing any irritation like many scrubs do. I love it! Pls never discontinue this exfoliator!

reviews.title: Omg what i needed
reviews.review_text: I am a hair person so where the grows leaves dead flakey skin. Exfoliating does not help. One use. The dead skin was gone. Sorry i did not do a before and pic

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.review_text: This product leaves my skins feeling great after. You can feel the exfoliants on your skin during application, the peeling occurs the more you rub in the product, and once washed off, it makes the skin feel soft.

reviews.title: Exfoliates Gently!
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive skin and have issues with exfoliants being too rough. This product is perfect! It helps my skin feel softer and isn't too harsh. Highly recommended.

reviews.title: Leaves skin so soft
reviews.review_text: I bought this very recently and have already used it a few times. I love it, it gives such a gentle exfoliation to the skin leaving it soft and fresh looking. Easy to use and results are good.

reviews.title: Nice gentle exfoliant
reviews.review_text: I really can feel a difference after using this physical exfoliant. The cellulose fibers pick up dry dead skin and my face has a healthy glow after using it. It also makes my skin very soft.

reviews.title: Love it, but needs a bottle upgrade!
reviews.review_text: Love this formula!!! It's so gentle on my skin, but good lawd almighty the pump in this bottle is terrible!!! Please upgrade the bottle, and not the price!! Lol I highly recommend this product!

reviews.title: Amoooooo fuertemente
reviews.review_text: Amo este exfoliante, mi piel está como nueva, luminosa y suave, muuuy suave... lo uso 2 veces por semana y no puedo estar más feliz, se lo compré a mi mamá y a mi hermana y están tan felices como yo con este producto, lo mejor de lo mejor de elf

reviews.title: Love
reviews.review_text: Purchased this three weeks ago. I love it. I have super sensitive skin, this product has zero side effects. My skin looks grey and dry after using for three weeks, my skin glows

reviews.title: Give it a chance!

reviews.title: Worth the money
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way! Directions say apply to dry skin but I use it in the shower and apply wet - the dead skin balls up and rinses away leaving smooth skin. Use only 2-3 x's per wk.

reviews.title: Tik Tok was Right

reviews.title: essential

reviews.title: Best Exfoliant Ever
reviews.review_text: This is definitely the best exfoliant I've ever used. It's not harsh on the skin but works instantly to get the dead skin off and leave the skin silky smooth.

reviews.title: Happily surprised by this purchase
reviews.review_text: This is a great dupe for the Peter Thomas Roth peeling exfoliator, which is three or four times more expensive than this. Very glad to save the money and get a product that exfoliates just as well as the "high end" version!

reviews.title: Gentle exfoliant

I'm in love. I never leave product reviews, but for this, I had to! I've never found a product that can fix my skin texture, but this one does. My skin looks smoother than I thought possible after using this - like glass.

reviews.title: Amazing skin peeling action.
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive skin, so I honestly have been hesitant with using this product on my face. But girl, these heels are desert dry. This stuff makes my little toes and heels so soft.

reviews.title: BEST BUY "EVER"
reviews.review_text: I just purchased this product about 2 weeks ago! I use it every 3 days, my skin is so sensitive, but I have had NO ISSUES using this product. It seems to be very gentle! I am very very happy with product!
This is a good exfoliant. I had been using Vivo Per Lei for a few years so decided to give this a try, glad I did. My skin is sooo soft & smooth after using this. Will purchase again.

reviews.title: Gentle and nice!
reviews.review_text: Was skeptical but I decided to try it. Feels great on the skin! Very gentle exfoliation and causes no damage to the skin. Feels refreshing and easy to use.

reviews.title: What a life saver for my winter skin!
reviews.review_text: I bought this during black Friday sales on a whim and I am absolutely in love. I've been using it twice a week and it has definitely helped with dru flaky patches but isn't too harsh on my sensitive skin. My skin feels SO SOFT afterwards.

reviews.title: It's almost too good to be true!
reviews.review_text: I needed a new face cleanser that would go a little deeper than my everyday one, to use together via my electronic face brushes, I have a Clarisonic and a Foreo. Even though I use the electronic devises, I feel when I use a good cleanser I don't need to get a facial at all. I was used to high end products but lately I've been giving ELF a try and I'm being very pleasantly surprised by their quality. I expected this to be a sticky and grainy-ish type of formula. It is not. It's so smooth, so I liked it right away, even though I was skeptical. I tried it with my fingers, because I wanted to see the product for itself. And OH MY GOODNESS! Right away some small pieces of dead skin already came off. I couldn't believe it! It left my skin feeling so silky, smooth and bright. I've left my face bare after that, no moisturizer or serum, because I wanted to see if it would dry out my skin (I have normal-dry skin and live in a super cold climate). Nope, no dryness at all. This is a tiny miracle. No way I'm spending money on facials with this gold-worth liquid in a bottle. I'm excited to try it out with some mask and the electronic brushes. It's a favorite!

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.review_text: I have super dry and flaky skin in the winter, even when I moisturize. So I got this to try to reduce the flakiness! I use it once a week after my cleanser, and I cleanse again. Ridiculously soft skin, zero flakiness, and it's so gentle on my sensitive skin! At first I was confused because I didn't read the packaging and instructions well enough and I thought it was a regular scrubby exfoliator, but then when it wasn't scrubby I was upset. Then I actually read it properly and realized lol. Will definitely use this forever!
